GeoNode Summit 2018

Torino, Italy | March 26 - 28, 2018

Become a speaker! Register

About GeoNode Summit

Join us for a 3-day packed event to learn and contribute to GeoNode!
Presentations

The GeoNode event of the year with awesome speakers and lots of fun!

Workshops

Improve your knowledge of GeoNode with workshops held by core developers aimed at users and developers!

Roadmapping

One full day for an open discussion on the future of GeoNode.

How to get to the venue

The venue is at ITHACA facility. ITHACA is based in the Politecnico di Torino campus Cittadella Politecnica: a modern complex adjoining the main building, including areas dedicated to students, research activities, technological transfer and servi... continue reading
